wikipedia_page.main: James Weaver is a British actor who is usually a guest actor for most of his television work such as; Heartbeat, Outside the Rules, Rose and Malone and The Bill. James also appears regularly in theatrical productions in and around London.

response: * James Weaver (Wisconsin politician) (1800–1886), member of the Wisconsin State Assembly
* James Weaver (racing driver) (born 1955), British race car driver
